mapper.select: select uid, nickname, username, description, level, wallet_balance, user_state, create_date, exp, update_date, state from minibox.mb_user where uid = #{uid}
select uid, nickname, username, description, level, wallet_balance, user_state, create_date, exp, update_date, state from minibox.mb_user limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into minibox.mb_user(nickname, username, password) values (#{nickname}, #{username}, #{password})

insert into minibox.mb_user(nickname, username, password, description, level, wallet_balance, user_state, create_date, exp, update_date, state) values
